bentoSection.title: BENEFITS
bentoSection.subtitle: Why Choose Our Smart Yield Solutions?

features.title: Increase Your Margins
features.description: Enjoy fewer instances of fraud and payment disputes thanks to our secure, cutting-edge technology. This helps protect your profits and improve your margins.

features.title: Protect Against Currency Risks
features.description: We diversify your business’s earnings by converting a portion of your funds into stable global currencies (50% US dollars and 50% Euros), reducing the impact of fluctuations in the Rupiah.

features.title: Boost Returns on Idle Cash
features.description: Make your business’s daily cashflow work harder for you. By putting your cash to work in carefully managed financial programs, you can earn a higher return while maintaining easy access to your funds.

features.title: Simple Liquidity & Cashflow Management
features.description: With real-time tracking and flexible access to your earnings, you can manage your cashflow with ease, making smarter financial decisions for your business.

features.title: Tailored Support with Local Expertise
features.description: We provide hands-on support for businesses in South East Asia, helping you tap into global financial strategies with local expertise and care.

features.title: Stable Value
features.description: Each IDRX is designed to maintain a 1:1 value with the Indonesian Rupiah, offering stability and predictability for your business finances.

features.title: Fully Backed & Reliable
features.description: All funds backing IDRX are held at regulated financial institutions, ensuring your money is safe and fully accessible.
